title: The most important evidence of seeing the dead chasing the living in a dream is according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi

preview.html: What are the most important signs that indicate that the dead are chasing the living in a dream? Interpretation of seeing the deceased chasing the living in a dream. Does the appearance of the dead in a dream while chasing the dreamer carry connotations that are beneficial to the vision or not? How did Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin interpret this scene? Currently. Do you have a confusing dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Chasing the dead in the neighborhood in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about the dead chasing the living is bad if the appearance of the dead is strange and frightening. The jurists said that this scene is most likely from Satan and has no other meaning than that. But when the deceased appears to be chasing the dreamer in the dream, and he wants to He eats and drinks, then the purpose of this search is the deceased’s need for alms. If the dreamer sees his dead father chasing him in a dream and is afraid of him because the father’s features were full of angry looks, then this vision means the ugliness of the dreamer’s actions and his fear of divine punishment, and seeing the deceased this way in the dream indicates He is dissatisfied with his son’s behavior, and wants to change it so that he can live hidden from the afterlife. When he sees the deceased in a dream, he follows the dreamer wherever he goes, and looks at him with contentment and love, as if thanking him for his religious deeds and behavior, then the meaning of the dream indicates that the dreamer is performing all the required duties. By him towards the dead, as he prays for him, gives him alms and remembers him at every step in his life, and these situations put the dead in a state of reassurance and solace due to the multiplication of his good deeds and his resurrection. His position is in the Lord of the Worlds. Chasing the dead in the neighborhood in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees a dead person chasing him in the dream, this is a warning from the Lord of the Worlds that the person’s life, no matter how long, will end one day, and this person will go to the Creator until he obtains his account and knows his fate, The dream is therefore an explicit appeal to the dreamer to listen to the demands of the afterlife, pray and be chaste before it is too late. The dreamer should carefully note the appearance in which he saw the deceased in the dream while being chased. If the dreamer saw his dead father chasing him in the dream, and he had a sharp tool with which he wanted to hit him like a sword, then the scene indicates an error on the part of the fortuneteller, which made the deceased very angry. But if the fortuneteller indulges in chasing the deceased in the dream, and the two of them go together to a closed and unknown place, then the dream symbolizes the dreamer’s approaching death. And if the dead person continues to chase the dreamer, and wants to catch him and dress him in white clothes resembling a shroud, but the dreamer strongly refuses to wear these clothes. Leaving the dead, the dream expresses the dreamer’s sadness. With a serious illness that exposes him to death, but he recovers from it and will not die from it, God willing. What did Ibn Sirin say about the interpretation of the dead chasing the living in a dream? Chasing the dead in the living in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees her dead mother chasing her in a dream and her facial features are tired and her clothes are unclean, then The exact meaning of the dream symbolizes the mother’s poor condition in the afterlife, and chasing the dreamer in a dream is interpreted as preaching and sadness because the dreamer forgets her duties towards her mother. The woman’s sadness is unjust.

title: Interpretation of a pigeon in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you the interpretation of the dove in a dream for a single woman. It is one of the most beautiful and beautiful types of birds that fly in the sky and hover lightly. Prayer and peace when you lay eggs on the door of the cave is a bird of peace and love. There are many types of pigeons and many colors, and each of them in a dream has its own meaning that differs from other visions, as there are white, black, yellow, brown, orange and others, and there are other types of birds that differ in meaning from them such as falcons and crows, so we explain in the following encyclopedia the interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman for this dream. Interpretation of pigeons in a dream for a single woman According to what was mentioned in Ibn Sirin’s narration in this dream, we mention the following: The white dove in a dream symbolizes the happy news and occasions that the dreamer will experience from security and peace, and this dream often indicates marriage. The dream of a black dove is considered an undesirable dream, as it is a bad omen that you will lose something beloved or lose the desire that the dreamer desires, and entering the house indicates the emergence of disputes between her family or falling into debt. Seeing a black dove chasing an unmarried woman indicates the presence of a corrupt young man trying to deceive her and she must be careful. Seeing an unmarried woman cooking a pigeon in a dream and eating it portends marriage, while eating its eggs means that you will get On a job or inheritance. Interpretation of a pigeon's nest in a dream In the following paragraph, we provide an interpretation for an unmarried woman who sees a pigeon's nest in her dream: Seeing a single person in a bird's nest in a dream indicates the psychological stability in which she lives, while seeing a bird's eggs symbolizes a large diet or finding a desired job. Seeing an unmarried woman making a nest with her hands indicates preparations for marriage and preparing the marital home. The bachelor's demolition of a pigeon's nest indicates the end of an emotional relationship or engagement. Interpretation of a dream about a small pigeon Seeing a small pigeon is considered one of the most promising visions, and this is explained by its interpretation in the following paragraph: Catching a large group of small pigeons in a dream means that you will get a lot of money. The flight of a small pigeon indicates that the unmarried woman will have the opportunity to travel, and this may be to perform the Umrah pilgrimage, or to travel with the husband, and the reason for this may be learning or work, and in all cases, it is one of the commendable visions. The small pigeon symbolizes engagement, while the large pigeon indicates marriage. Interpretation of a colored pigeon in a single dream The interpretation of seeing a pigeon differs according to its color, and we will explain Below: Gray pigeon: This vision brings happiness to the visionary, especially if it is flying in the sky. Brown pigeon: Academic and practical success. White pigeon: Marriage and happiness. Interpretation of a dead and slaughtered pigeon in a single dream Scholars differed in interpreting this dream in the following sayings: Slaughtering a white bird in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s marriage. Some scholars say that seeing a slaughtered pigeon is an evil omen indicating illness or poverty, God forbid. As for the dead pigeon, seeing it indicates

title: Interpretation of descending in a dream: I descended the stairs in a dream

preview.html: A dream of descending the stairs for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man who either descends the stairs with difficulty, descends the stairs easily in fear, for a long time, dreams of a high place descending the stairs and descending from a height or skating according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq. Descending the stairs in a dream often indicates that it is a vision unpleasant. If you see the stairs going down, this means loss of money or a decline in power. If the person who sees the vision is in a higher position and because the stairs are going down, this is evidence of a rapid change in the dreamer’s life, as the interpretation scholars said: Interpretation of a dream of going down stairs: Whoever sees in his dream that he is going down from the top to the bottom This matter is an indication of what the person was and will now become in terms of marriage, material, religion, or beliefs. In addition, whoever descends in a dream from a high place, a block for example, indicates the difficulty of the matter he seeks to achieve. Whoever sees in his dream a familiar staircase And it is known to him, his vision indicates a person who serves the owners of the house in which this staircase is located. And the traveler who sees in a dream that he is ascending and descending the stairs, his vision indicates his return from his travels and meeting with his family and loved ones. And the person of high position and status who sees in his dream that he is descending the stairs, His vision indicates that he will be removed from his position. And whoever sees in his dream that he is descending the stairs while his wife is sick, then he will die. And the sick person who sees in a dream that he is descending the stairs and going to a destination and area known to him, then his vision indicates the disappearance of his illness and his recovery, for the best, God willing. He said. Translators: All steps of the ladder indicate good deeds such as prayer, fasting, paying zakat, jihad for the sake of God, visiting the Sacred House of God, and reciting the Holy Qur’an. If an unmarried girl or woman sees herself descending the stairs in a dream, this is an expression of deep fears in itself of failure or failure. This vision in general is a warning against getting into trouble or getting involved in a relationship that may ultimately lead to failure. Going down the stairs for a short time indicates a passing crisis, going down the stairs quickly shows the deterioration of relationships, and going down the stairs easily expresses going astray due to trifles, neglect of interests, or negative thinking. If you see in your dream that you are easily going down the stairs of the house, this means that you will go down in A good situation among your family and that you will return from a trial or trial with more strength and durability. Interpretation of descending the stairs in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is quickly descending the stairs, this is evidence that this girl has revealed the deception of someone who was in her life. Interpretation of descending Stairs in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is descending the stairs, but slowly, then this is evidence of worries and problems in this woman’s life, but they will end after a short period, God willing. Interpretation of descending the stairs in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is descending the stairs quickly, This means that the date of birth is approaching, but it will be a difficult birth and she will give birth to a male child, but she will be fine after the worries of this lady’s life, and God is Most High.

title: Interpretation of seeing the name Khaled in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the name Khaled in a dream: If the dreamer sees the name Khaled in a dream, this indicates the arrival of kindness, abundance, and abundant money to the dreamer. Seeing the name Khaled in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve more success and distinction in his life by the command of God Almighty. Seeing the name Khaled in a dream symbolizes The dreamer will reap a lot of profits and gains in the coming period, God willing. Seeing the person’s name, Khaled, means in a dream that he will recover soon and his health will improve a lot, God willing. Seeing a single young man named Khaled in a dream means that he will marry a beautiful and beloved girl, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the name Khaled in A dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees the name Khaled in her dream, this vision means that she will give birth to a good child, God willing. But if she called her husband with the name Khaled, it means that her husband will get a lot of money from his work. Seeing the name Khaled written on the wall in a married woman’s dream indicates That she will enjoy love and marital happiness. The name Khaled can also indicate in a married woman’s dream that she will soon become pregnant with a male child and that God is the Most High and All-Knowing. See the married name Khaled on the sign on the road, this means that she and her husband will enjoy great luck in life. Interpretation of the name Khaled for a girl If an unmarried woman sees the name Khaled in her dream, this vision indicates the nearness of comfort and freedom from worries and problems. They symbolize seeing the girl’s name Khaled written on a piece of paper in the dream that she will get married soon, God willing. Seeing the name Khaled in a single girl’s dream may indicate The date of her wedding with the person she loves is approaching, and God knows best. But if she sees that someone calling her mother’s name Khaled in her dream means that she will marry a famous person, and God knows best. Hearing the unique name Khaled in a dream means that someone called Khaled may propose to her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the name Khaled. By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing the name Khaled in a dream means that the dreamer is characterized by good morals and good behavior among people. If you see the person’s name Khaled, this dream shows in his dream the success and excellence that he will achieve in his life. But if the dreamer is with the signature of the name Khaled in the dream, it means that the dreamer will achieve his dreams. And the projects that he planned. Seeing Khaled’s poison in the dream symbolizes that the dreamer is in good health and will not be harmed, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about the name Khaled in a dream by Ibn KathirIbn Kathir explained that seeing Khaled’s name in a dream means that the dreamer has many responsibilities towards his family and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. If The sleeper saw in his dream the name Khaled on the walls of the wall, which means that he will achieve his hopes and dreams for which he strived. Then seeing the name Khaled in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness, great living, and abundant money to the one who has the vision, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing Khaled’s signature on a work of his own in The dream symbolizes that the priest’s work will achieve great success. Interpretation of seeing Khaled’s name written on the walls. Seeing Khaled’s name on the wall in a dream indicates that the dreamer is strong, brave, and in good health, and that God Almighty is All-Knowing. Then if the priest hears the name of Khaled

title: Interpretation of a house shaking in a dream - seeing a house shaking in a dream

preview.html: A dream of a house shaking, a dream of a house shaking, things shaking, the walls of the house moving, a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, if an earthquake occurs in the house, and the house tilts, and the body trembles. Some people may see many visions and dreams, but they They ignore its interpretation because there must be someone skilled in the field of dream interpretation. When one of you sees a dream about a house in a dream, he shows some indicators that we will explain to you through this article, as seeing a house in a dream for each specific situation has its own interpretation, as we bring To find out the interpretation of seeing a house in a dream from Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi and some dream interpreters. Interpretation of the house shaking in a dream. Seeing the house shaking in a dream indicates the occurrence of calamities and worries. Whoever sees his house shaking indicates the occurrence of diseases and misfortunes for the people of the house. The house shaking in a dream is a warning of the necessity of making some adjustments to the house or Leaving and moving to a new house. The collapse of the house in the dream after shaking indicates death. A married man or woman who saw a house shaking in a dream indicates separation and divorce. Interpretation of the earthquake in the house in the dream. As for the interpretation of a dream about an earthquake occurring in the house, it can be said that if a person dreams of this, this is evidence of the death of one of his companions. And that he will face many difficulties and problems. If one sees that the earthquake has destroyed many houses and houses in many countries, this indicates that many disasters will occur and that this country will be exposed to great strife, but if one sees that the houses are sinking underground, this indicates pressure. The life that exposed the dreamer and exposed him to a lot of injustice. But if you see that the house in which you live was destroyed by an earthquake, this indicates a shift from one situation to another. For example, if you are poor, you will become rich. Interpretation of the house in a dream for Nabulus: The dreamer may see that he sees the house as spacious, even though he actually lives in a narrow house. This indicates that the dreamer is expanding his diet beyond measure. Difficult things in life, but those difficult things go away with the grace of Almighty God. When one sees the door of the house open to its seekers and all the residents of the house leaving it, this also indicates the end of the anxiety that afflicts man in this world. The complexion is good because exposure to some problems in life leads to unhappiness in life, but this dream indicates comfort and the end of anxiety.Interpretation of the house in the dreamThe house in the dream does not indicate anything bad, but it is necessary for the interpreters to know the situation in which we dreamed of the house, as it can For the interpreter, by carefully watching the dream, to provide an interpretation that corresponds to your life situation in this world, if you are close to the world and have some debts. And your life will be very difficult, and this indicates the end of this anxiety by seeing the house in all its conditions, like all interpretations that It can be interpreted by seeing a house and a house in a dream, even if it is abandoned. Interpretation of a house in a dream - YouTube

This indicates that the dreamer is expanding his diet beyond measure. Difficult things in life, but those difficult things go away with the grace of Almighty God. When one sees the door of the house open to its seekers and all the residents of the house leaving it, this also indicates the end of the anxiety that afflicts man in this world. The complexion is good because exposure to some problems in life leads to unhappiness in life, but this dream indicates comfort and the end of anxiety.Interpretation of the house in the dreamThe house in the dream does not indicate anything bad, but it is necessary for the interpreters to know the situation in which we dreamed of the house, as it can For the interpreter, by carefully watching the dream, to provide an interpretation that corresponds to your life situation in this world, if you are close to the world and have some debts. And your life will be very difficult, and this indicates the end of this anxiety by seeing the house in all its conditions, like all interpretations that It can be interpreted by seeing a house and a house in a dream, even if it is abandoned. Interpretation of a house in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing a wasp sting in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a wasp stinging in a dream or vision through the vision website roy2a.com. The wasp is a predatory insect that swarms build a nest that it defends by stinging anyone who approaches it. Seeing someone stung by a wasp in a dream also has bad connotations for the most part, but interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a wasp sting in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether he is male or female. Single, married or pregnant female. Today we will return to the interpretation of seeing a wasp sting in a dream in detail based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. So follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a wasp sting in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing a wasp sting in a dream indicates an evil and combative person who is better to avoid and stay away from. Seeing a wasp in a dream indicates a person who supports a lie and continues with it. Seeing a wasp sting and feeling pain is bad speech. It is pronounced by the viewer and causes him grief. Seeing a wasp sting and the dreamer does not feel painIt indicates the evil that will happen to the viewer, but he will not pay attention to it, which makes his haters feel confused. See also: Interpretation of seeing an insect sting in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a wasp sting in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Vision A wasp sting in a dream may indicate that the dreamer was robbed and plundered by bandits. Seeing a wasp in a dream could indicate a murderer or a person earning money illegally. What is the interpretation of seeing a wasp sting in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman being stung by a wasp in a dream is Indicates false words and slander that someone she trusts will say about her. Seeing an unmarried woman being stung by a wasp in a dream portends that he will fall into a planned, cunning and deceitful grudge. Seeing an unmarried woman in a wasp’s nest and being stung by it indicates the presence of women spreading rumors about her and defaming her reputation in the world. A student who is stung by a wasp in a dream indicates the possibility of failure and failure in her studies. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wasp in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a wasp sting in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman stung by a wasp in a dream shows that she will be jealous of people who hate her. Seeing a married woman on That she is a wasp in the house in a dream indicates many disputes and problems that arise in her home and with her husband. Seeing a married woman stung by a wasp in a dream indicates people who claim to love her and who actually hate her and want to harm her. Seeing a married woman stung by a wasp in a dream indicates a corrupt and immoral person who He wants to commit a sin. Seeing a married woman sting her husband’s wasp in a dream indicates crises that may occur in the health or work sector. See also: Interpretation of seeing a scorpion sting in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a wasp sting in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing pregnant wasps in a dream could be a sign On feelings of stress at this time, fear for the fetus, and anxiety about the future. Seeing a pregnant woman stung in a dream by a wasp indicates problems that the mother will go through during pregnancy or hardships.

title: Interpretation of a bag in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of the wallet in a dream, as it is one of the most important stocks for every person, as he uses it to keep his own money and also to keep his important papers in it, so it has special benefits for everyone, but what is the meaning of seeing it in a dream and is it a sign of good or a warning of evil, and can the fortune teller be exposed? Through this article from the encyclopedia, we will learn about what dream interpretation scholars have mentioned on this topic. Interpretation of the wallet in a dream Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees that someone she knows gave her a new wallet and asked her to keep it with her until she returns to get it, then this vision is a message to the girl that someone will entrust her with a secret related to her. Life, and this girl must carry confidence and keep this secret and not reveal it to anyone under any circumstances. It is a good vision for a girl to see in her dream that she found a wallet and returned it to its owner, and this vision symbolizes this girl's morals and honesty. Interpretation of a dream about losing a wallet for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream a wallet of money, and it is full of money and in new and good condition, then this vision symbolizes the positive thoughts that this woman has about her life and her view of the world in general. And if she sees in her dream that she is picking up a bag from the street lying on the ground, then this dream means that God Almighty will grant her and her husband a lot of good. One of the commendable interpretations of seeing a wallet in a dream for a married woman is that it shows the security and confidence that a woman feels with her husband. A demon in a dream for a pregnant woman One of the visions with important indications for a pregnant woman is that she sees in her dream that she is taking a bag from the street. This dream means that this woman will be tested by God for the extent of her honesty and ability to do so. Bearing responsibility, it is a sign of watching what he says and does. And if the dream she saw was that her husband gave her a new wallet, then this vision foretells that God Almighty will give birth to her easily and she will give birth to her son without health problems, God willing. Interpretation of a gift of a wallet in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that someone gives him a wallet as a gift, this vision portends the coming good for the visionary, and if the visionary is married, then this vision shows that God Almighty will grant him righteous offspring. And if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that someone gives her a wallet, then this dream indicates that someone will propose to this girl and she will be happy with this engagement and she will notice that this person has trusted her and will want to do so. She feels happy in her life and has a good husband. Interpretation of a dream about losing a wallet and then finding it. Whoever sees in a dream that his wallet is lost and he cannot find it, this vision tells the dreamer that there are people who are talking badly about him and trying to undermine his reputation, and he does not know and cannot respond to these slander, and if he sees that he was able to find them, he will defeat these enemies, and it will become clear to people the invalidity of their intentions and bad morals. In the interpretation of losing a wallet, it is said

title: Interpretation of seeing a nursing home in a dream

preview.html: Dream Interpretation to see a home for the elderly in a dream, a home for the elderly is a place where elderly and elderly people are placed, who have no family or caregivers. Good, or it could be a warning or a warning against the appearance of evil, and interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of the nursing home. Whether she is a single woman, married, pregnant, or divorced today, through the Vision website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a nursing home in a dream, based on the opinion of leading interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing an old man in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing an old woman in a dream. Show good news, blessings, and wonderful food. Dreaming of an old woman in a dream. It indicates joy, happiness, and abundance of livelihood and children. Seeing an old woman, a girl or woman, is good news and evidence of piety and righteousness. Transforming a woman or girl into an old woman in The dream shows that he has a clear mind that can put things in their place. Seeing an old man with an ugly appearance is an indication of the collapse of problems, the end of conflicts, and the healing of diseases. Seeing an old woman with a full body is evidence of a lot of goodness and wealth after poverty and recovery from illness. Seeing an old woman It indicates evil and evil. Seeing a man The sick old man. Mention the weakness and frailty that afflicts the fortuneteller. Seeing an old woman returning to youth in a dream. It indicates recovery after illness, wealth after poverty, goodness and prosperity. Interpretation of seeing an old man in a dream for a single woman. The dream of an old man in one dream. It indicates great goodness, happiness and psychological stability. Dream of an old man. Pious in a dream indicates her marriage to a good man. Interpretation of seeing an old woman in a dream for a married woman. Seeing an old married woman in a dream indicates that she has righteous offspring. Seeing a woman growing old in a dream is a reflection of her increasing tension and indeed her beauty has gone. Seeing an old woman in a dream of delayed childbearing was this A message to her that she should try to have children and that she will succeed in trying and have children. Interpretation of seeing an old woman in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a traitorous old woman in a pregnant dream. Remembering the difficulty of giving birth. Seeing a traitorous woman in a pregnant dream. Referring to her husband earning forbidden money. A pregnant woman sees an old woman. She enters her house and improves her hospitality. Evidence of great goodness is taken from the sign. Interpretation of seeing an old man in a man’s dream. Seeing an old man in a dream of a man suffering from a chronic illness announces the approaching death of a man. Seeing an old man in a man’s dream indicates that the dreamer owns a lot of poor property and lands. The old man’s dream is bad and it is It indicates that the country in which he resides is exposed to war, hardship, and sorrow. Seeing an unfaithful old man in a man’s dream is an indication of earning money in a forbidden way. Seeing a naked old man in a man’s dream is evidence of revealing something that the insightful person hides from others, which will cause him a great scandal in life and death. Seeing a man An old man in a dream enters a man’s house, which indicates a person’s goodness and good deeds that make everything easy for him. Seeing a man

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a man I know had sex with me

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a man I know having sex with me: The vision of intercourse is one of the dreams that disturbs and worries a person, especially if that person is a mahram or is not the husband of a married woman today. Interpretation of a dream of a man I know having sex with meWhen a woman sees in her dream that a man is having intercourse with her, the interpretation of this vision varies according to her social status. Another man had sex with her and she did not know him. The vision could be a sign of the person’s imminent marriage and his thinking about it and his anxiety about this new experience. If the dreamer is married, this symbolizes her desire for her husband and the feelings of love that dominate the relationship between them after a period of problems and crises. This vision It may warn the dreamer that he is far from the path of God and a call to him to avoid forbidden things and stop what he is doing, otherwise his fate will be shame and scandal. Interpretation of seeing a man having sex with me in Ibn Sirin Our respected scholar Ibn Sirin saw in the interpretation of this vision that the woman who sees in her dream that her husband is the one who had intercourse with her This is evidence of the emotional and familial relationship between them and that married life is free. From suffering and problems, as she always works to make her husband happy and spares no effort in trying to obtain her satisfaction and care. But if he sees that someone other than him has had intercourse with his wife in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will gain many benefits by helping this man to him in reality. If a woman sees herself connected to her sister, this indicates friendship and the relationship between the two brothers. A woman’s intercourse with a strange man in her dream indicates that she has committed sins in her real life. If the wife sees herself having intercourse with someone other than her husband, this indicates a disturbance in the marital relationship in reality, and the man’s lack of interest in the affairs of His wife. The appearance in a dream of a man and a woman he does not know in a dream is evidence of the benefit that the dreamer will receive. Seeing a woman refusing to marry her husband in a dream indicates a great loss that the wife or husband will suffer in the coming period. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen in seeing intercourse in a dream and a man having intercourse with his wife. During her menstruation, it is evidence that the husband has sworn to his wife to divorce him, which is in fact forbidden to him, and the vision here is a warning to the fortuneteller not to exceed any of God’s limits. (He is Glory be to Him, Most High). As for the connection between insight and animals, this indicates that the dreamer enjoys the power, prestige, and influence of the dreamer, which makes him triumph over all difficulties in his life, and if the animals are predatory, this is a sign. From the dreamer. Victory over those who wanted evil and tried to harm him. Seeing sexual intercourse with a masked person indicates the turmoil and anxiety that the viewer feels. But if a man sees that he is having sexual intercourse with a dead woman in a dream, this indicates achieving a goal that was difficult to achieve before. The intimate relationship between Spouses in full view of people indicates the disclosure of the secrets of marriage, but if it is between the spouses in the wife’s family home, this indicates the bond between them and the end of problems and disagreements after the spouses intervene. The wife’s family. If a man dreams that he is having intercourse with his deceased wife, this means that the time of his death is approaching. Seeing him among people

From suffering and problems, as she always works to make her husband happy and spares no effort in trying to obtain her satisfaction and care. But if he sees that someone other than him has had intercourse with his wife in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will gain many benefits by helping this man to him in reality. If a woman sees herself connected to her sister, this indicates friendship and the relationship between the two brothers. A woman’s intercourse with a strange man in her dream indicates that she has committed sins in her real life. If the wife sees herself having intercourse with someone other than her husband, this indicates a disturbance in the marital relationship in reality, and the man’s lack of interest in the affairs of His wife. The appearance in a dream of a man and a woman he does not know in a dream is evidence of the benefit that the dreamer will receive. Seeing a woman refusing to marry her husband in a dream indicates a great loss that the wife or husband will suffer in the coming period. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen in seeing intercourse in a dream and a man having intercourse with his wife. During her menstruation, it is evidence that the husband has sworn to his wife to divorce him, which is in fact forbidden to him, and the vision here is a warning to the fortuneteller not to exceed any of God’s limits. (He is Glory be to Him, Most High). As for the connection between insight and animals, this indicates that the dreamer enjoys the power, prestige, and influence of the dreamer, which makes him triumph over all difficulties in his life, and if the animals are predatory, this is a sign. From the dreamer. Victory over those who wanted evil and tried to harm him. Seeing sexual intercourse with a masked person indicates the turmoil and anxiety that the viewer feels. But if a man sees that he is having sexual intercourse with a dead woman in a dream, this indicates achieving a goal that was difficult to achieve before. The intimate relationship between Spouses in full view of people indicates the disclosure of the secrets of marriage, but if it is between the spouses in the wife’s family home, this indicates the bond between them and the end of problems and disagreements after the spouses intervene. The wife’s family. If a man dreams that he is having intercourse with his deceased wife, this means that the time of his death is approaching. Seeing him among people
